title: Bugs in torch.std and torch.var
body_html:
Torch Tensor (or FloatTensor) returns wrong values of std and var.
Below is sample code.

import numpy as np
import torch

# torch tensor
x = torch.Tensor([[1, 2, 3, 4], 
                 [5, 6, 7, 10]])

print(x.std())      # 2.9154759474226504 
print(x.var())      # 8.5

# numpy tensor containing same values
y = np.array([[1, 2, 3, 4],
              [5, 6, 7, 10]])

print(y.std())      #4.75
print(y.var())     #7.4375

Which part of the code should I look to fix a bug?
